title: nitrobetting
author: nitrobetting
created_time: August 10, 2023, 02:01:22 AMLast edit: September 06, 2023, 05:31:11 AM by nitrobetting
content: JOIN THE EXCLUSIVE COMMUNITY NFL SURVIVOR POOL!Run it back! NFL Survivor Pools on Nitrobetting are back!We’re inviting our followers to an EXCLUSIVE NFL Survivor Community Pool where a 20 mBTC GTD prize is up for grabs! Simply reply to this thread and share your experience about Nitrobetting’s NFL Survivor Pools in previous years (if you’re a long-time Nitro member) or share what you expect for the new NFL season (if you’re a new member on Nitrobetting!) and you’re in!Don’t forget to include your Nitrobetting ID so we can add you to the exclusive list!New to Survivor Pool? Read our guide first. Join other Survivor Pools by picking pools here.Think you got what it takes? Bring that gridiron knowledge and win bitcoin!  RULES and GUIDELINESMembers ranked as "NEWBIES" are disqualified to joinThe last chance to enter is September 5, 2023 @ 11:59 PM EST.Only one entry per user for Nitrobetting’'s NFL Survivor Community Pool; however, you can still join other paid pools and the main Free Pool. Only replies in THIS thread will be considered. Replies must include the Nitrobetting ID (Nitrobetting ID) and the required short post about NFL Survivor/NFL. All Nitro IDs will be added to the pool manually. If qualified, expect your entry to be added within 3-5 days from the time of your post. You will only see the secret pool when you are registered. Prizes in the Community Pool will be paid in Bitcoin (with a 3x Rollover requirement) at nitrobetting.eu.  Previously banned players will not be allowed to join. The NFL Survivor Community Pool will include all qualified users from Nitro’s social media pages on Threads, Nostr, Twitter, Reddit, and Bitcoin Talk.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Nitrobetting ID: 267I can finally join the survivor pool without using a VPN.  It took me a while to find the survivor pool and it is located in the games section (between the poker and bonuses) if the link above doesn't lead you there.

comments.author: iantoxicated
comments.body: 212855 I love the Nitro Survivor Pools so dang much. Something I look forward to every year.
